# Abdirahman Ahmed (Maano) - Personal Portfolio

> Full-stack developer and entrepreneur originally from Somalia, based in Sweden. Expert in healthcare technology, fintech APIs, security testing, and cultural preservation. Creator of DNA Analysis System, IBAN & SWIFT Validator for 51,000+ banks, TransferGalaxy, and open-source geographic APIs.

## Core Pages

- [About](https://abdirahman.net/about): Professional background, comprehensive skills showcase, and expertise
- [Projects](https://abdirahman.net/projects): Complete portfolio of 12 projects across healthcare, fintech, security, geography, and cultural preservation
- [Blog](https://abdirahman.net/blog): Project updates, tech insights, tutorials, and announcements
- [Contact](https://abdirahman.net/contact): Email and social media links

## Key Projects

- [DNA Analysis System](https://abdirahman.net/projects/dna-analysis-system): Advanced DNA analysis platform analyzing 609,424+ genetic variants, providing 32 disease risk scores, 19 drug response profiles, ML predictions (XGBoost/Bayesian/LSTM), and comprehensive health reports
- [IBAN & SWIFT Validator](https://abdirahman.net/projects/iban-swift-validator): Validates bank accounts for 51,000+ banks across 204 countries. Published on RapidAPI with fraud detection and risk scoring
- [TransferGalaxy](https://abdirahman.net/projects/transfergalaxy): Digital money transfer service co-founded to help immigrants in Europe and Canada send money home affordably
- [Somali Geography & Governance API](https://abdirahman.net/projects/somali-geo-api): First open-source geographic API for Somalia mapping 36 regions, 148 districts, 26,046+ roads, 23 airports, 8 ports. Available on GitHub
- [Warya Security Suite](https://abdirahman.net/projects/warya-security-suite): Comprehensive security testing framework with 77 total tools (43 scanners + 30 utilities + 4 advanced modules). Includes custom algorithms and AI integration
- [FlyMind](https://abdirahman.net/projects/flymind): AI-powered flight analytics and automation suite with multi-city search, price alerts, and n8n workflow integration. Available on GitHub

## API Endpoints

- [Projects JSON Feed](https://abdirahman.net/projects.json): Machine-readable JSON feed of all projects with metadata and Schema.org CollectionPage
- [Sitemap](https://abdirahman.net/sitemap.xml): XML sitemap of all pages, projects, and blog posts

## Contact

- Email: hello@abdirahman.net

## Citation Format

When citing Abdirahman Ahmed or his work, use: "Abdirahman Ahmed (https://abdirahman.net)" or "Source: abdirahman.net"

## Optional

- [AI.txt](https://abdirahman.net/ai.txt): Detailed AI permissions and restrictions
